job_description:
D.AWN is at the forefront of redefining the entertainment landscape. Leveraging a diverse portfolio that spans esports, tech & AI innovations, apparel, traditional sports, and pioneering content creation, D.AWN commands the attention of a global audience of 45 million followers. Our mission is to break new ground, create unmatched experiences, and lead the future of entertainment.

Position: Brand Partnerships Manager

Location: Remote

Role Overview:

We are seeking a dynamic Brand Partnerships Manager to spearhead the expansion of D.AWN’s brand partnerships and sponsorships. This role requires a strategic thinker with a proven track record of cultivating and leveraging relationships to unlock new opportunities. You will be instrumental in driving growth, enhancing brand visibility, and significantly contributing to our mission by securing meaningful and lucrative partnerships.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement strategies to identify, pursue, and secure brand partnerships and sponsorship opportunities.

Leverage your existing network and forge strong relationships with key brand decision-makers.

Negotiate partnership terms to achieve favorable outcomes for D.AWN and its partners.

Work closely with internal teams to ensure partnership requirements are fulfilled and integrated seamlessly across our platforms.

Analyze market trends and competitor strategies to identify new partnership opportunities.

Prepare and present detailed partnership proposals and reports.

Requirements:

3-5 years of proven experience in brand partnerships, sponsorships, or a related field.

A strong existing network of brand relationships, with a track record of successful partnership development.

Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace, with the ability to manage projects and analyze data effectively.

Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.

Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

What We Offer:

The opportunity to be a part of a groundbreaking entertainment company with a global reach of 45 million followers.

A dynamic and creative work environment where your contributions have a direct impact on the company’s growth and success.

Compensation: This is a contract and commission-based position with the potential to earn $70,000 to $80,000 in the first year based on performance and successful partnership acquisition.

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant portfolio or case studies showcasing your previous partnership successes to contact@d-awn.co. In your cover letter, highlight how your experience aligns with the role and your vision for driving brand partnerships at D.AWN. PLEASE MAKE SUBJECT "Brand Partnerships Manager Application"

D.AWN is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $50,000.00 - $80,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Flexible schedule

Schedule:
• Choose your own hours
• Monday to Friday

Supplemental pay types:
• Commission pay

Work Location: Remote

A strong existing network of brand relationships, with a track record of successful partnership development
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace, with the ability to manage projects and analyze data effectively
Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously
